translation.en: On this day, July 1st, 2014, at this hour, 0600,
translation.zh: 今天是2014年7月1日 现在时间六点

translation.en: we are at the very first airport in the world…
translation.zh: 我们现在在世界上第一个机场…

translation.en: [reporter 2] …the topic of so much controversy over the past seven years,

translation.zh: 争议如今仍然甚嚣尘上

translation.en: and a number of developing countries continue.
translation.zh: 发展中国家的抗议仍在继续

translation.en: [reporter 1] …it has been claimed that CW-7 is the answer to global warming.
translation.zh: …据说CW-7是解决全球变暖的办法

translation.en: [reporter 2] …world leaders who argue that global warming can no longer be ignored.
translation.zh: …世界领导人们认为 全球变暖不能再被忽视

translation.en: Today, 79 countries will begin dispersing CW-7
into the upper layers of the atmosphere.
[reporter 3] …upper layers of the atmosphere, and surprisingly,
translation.zh: …大气层的上层 令人惊讶的是

translation.en: bring down the average global temperatures to the finest levels.
translation.zh: CW-7将全球气温降至最佳水平

translation.en: It is just a day away…
According to scientists, the artificial cooling substance, CW-7,
translation.zh: 据科学家称 人造冷却物质CW-7

translation.en: will succeed in bringing average global temperatures down to manageable levels
translation.zh: 将成功地让全球平均气温 降至可控水平

translation.en: as a revolutionary solution to mankind's warming of the planet.
translation.zh: 以此作为 人类地球变暖的革命性解决方案

translation.en: [young man] Can't you sit and count? Do you wanna get shot?
translation.zh: 你不能坐下来数吗？你想挨枪子吗？
闭嘴 埃德加 我在思考

translation.en: Are there any experienced violinists here?
translation.zh: 这里有经验丰富的小提琴手吗？

translation.en: Violinists? Are they having a laugh?
translation.zh: 小提琴手？他们在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Those bastards in the front section think they own us.
translation.zh: 前端车厢的那些混蛋 以为我们是他们的所属物

translation.en: Eating steak dinners and listening to string quartets and that.
translation.zh: 吃着牛排、听着弦乐四重奏什么的

translation.en: -We'll be different when we get there. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 等到了那里 我们就不一样了

translation.en: My wife and I played violin in the Boston Symphony Orchestra.
translation.zh: 我和妻子曾在波士顿交响乐团 拉过小提琴

translation.en: -I was first chair. -[soldier 2] Can you still play?
translation.zh: 我是首席小提琴手 你现在还能拉奏吗？

translation.en: -Of course. You never forget. -[soldier 2] Show me your hands.
translation.zh: 当然 这是不会忘的 给我看看你的双手

translation.en: Leave your belongings. We just need your hands.
translation.zh: 把你的随身物品留下 我们只需要你的双手
是一起 你的双手一起

translation.en: My wife, Doris, plays beautifully, better than me.
translation.zh: 我的妻子桃瑞丝 拉得很好 比我拉得还好

translation.en: I'll be back, Doris. It's all right.
translation.zh: 我会回来的 桃瑞丝 没事的

translation.en: What does steak taste like again?
I had it once, but I can't remember.
translation.zh: 我之前吃过一次 但现在记不得了

translation.en: [Curtis] If you can't remember, then it's better to forget.
translation.zh: 如果你记不得了 那最好将其忘记

translation.en: Alright then, what does it smell like when it's cooking?
translation.zh: 煎牛排的时候是什么味道呢？

translation.en: When it's emanating around the place.
translation.zh: 当味道四处发散的时候
柯蒂斯？现在是时候了吗？
你过得怎么样 朋友？

translation.en: Give me a pound. Blow it up.
Think I need that protein block. How about I trade you?
translation.zh: 我想我需要蛋白质块 我跟你交换怎么样？

translation.en: -Gimme this one. I'll give you that one. -Hey. Relax, relax, relax.
translation.zh: -给我这个 我就会把那个给你 -冷静

translation.en: I will give you this one and that one for that one.
translation.zh: 我要用这个和那个来换你的这个

translation.en: Your mom's gonna give you a damn good spanking!
translation.zh: 你妈妈会狠狠打你一顿的！

translation.en: Dunno where the fuck he went.
Give us it. Give us it.
You all right, Jose? How're you doing?
[woman] Why did you let him get up there?
translation.zh: 你为什么让他上那儿去？

translation.en: I didn't. He got up there by himself. He's very nimble.
translation.zh: 他自己爬上去的 他很灵活的

translation.en: -He's five! -[Edgar] He's a very nimble five year old.
translation.zh: -他才五岁！ -他是个很灵活的五岁小孩

translation.en: What do you want for it?
No. No, I'm sorry. I can't do that. I can't do that.
translation.zh: 不行 抱歉 我不能给你那个

translation.en: Yes! I get the ball for a whole hour.
translation.zh: 能！我要一个小时的皮球使用权
柯蒂斯 现在是时候了吗？
还没到时候 塔尼娅 很快了

translation.en: Yeah, it's the one we've been waiting for.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们等这个等很久了

translation.en: Our informant gave us a name.
translation.zh: 线人给了我们一个名字

translation.en: He's a security expert. He's in the prison section now.
translation.zh: 他是一个安保专家 现在在监狱车厢

translation.en: Wait. You're joking, right? He's in prison.
translation.zh: 他是一个安保专家 现在在监狱车厢 -你在开玩笑吧？他在监狱里 -喂 离开这里
-你在开玩笑吧？他在监狱里 -喂 离开这里

translation.en: I just think if this guy says that he's such a great security expert, why can't he break himself--
translation.zh: 如果他是出色的安保专家 为什么他不能自己…

translation.en: Edgar just wants to help, you know?
translation.zh: 埃德加只是想要帮忙 你知道吗？

translation.en: He shouldn't worship me the way he does. I'm not who he thinks I am.
translation.zh: 他不应该崇拜我 我不是他想的那种人
很少有人真正了解别人

translation.en: Tail section. Quarantine section. Prison section.
translation.zh: 尾部车厢、隔离车厢、监狱车厢

translation.en: Four seconds when all three gates are open at once.
translation.zh: 四秒钟时间 三扇大门同时打开

translation.en: We have four seconds to go through three gates
translation.zh: 我们有四秒钟的时间通过三扇大门

translation.en: Then Nam gets us the rest of the way.
translation.zh: 然后南带我们走完剩下的路

translation.en: Our fate depends on this man.
translation.zh: 我们的命运取决于这个人

translation.en: If we can get him to cooperate, he can get us to the front of the train.
translation.zh: 如果他愿意合作 那他就能把我们带到列车的前端

translation.en: From here right to the front of the train.
We control the engine, we control the world.
translation.zh: 我们控制了引擎 就控制了世界
没有那个 我们就一无所有

translation.en: All past revolutions failed 'cause they couldn't take the engine.
translation.zh: 过去所有的革命都失败了 因为他们没有掌控引擎

translation.en: This time we take the engine.
translation.zh: 这一次我们要掌控引擎

translation.en: You should run the train now, not Wilford.
translation.zh: 现在应该是你来负责列车 而不是威尔福德

translation.en: I'm a shadow of my former shadow.
translation.zh: 我现在已经大不如前了
我的时代是几十年前的时候了

translation.en: Listen, I'm not saying I want that to happen. That's not what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 我不是说我希望那样 我不是那个意思

translation.en: What I mean is, he will die someday.
translation.zh: 我的意思是他总有一天会死

translation.en: And when that happens, you're gonna have to take over.
translation.zh: 到那时候你就必须接手了

translation.en: You're gonna have to run the train.
I think you'd be pretty good if you ask me.
How far back can you remember?
translation.zh: 你能记得多久以前的事？
你妈妈 你还记得她吗？

translation.en: I can remember her face… every once in a while.
translation.zh: 我时不时就能想起她的脸
所有人趴在自己的位置！
-抓住他了 我们走 -放轻松

translation.en: [soldier 3] You! Let's go! Do I have all day?
translation.zh: 你！我们走！ 我哪有一天的时间等？

translation.en: -Just a medical check. Doing good. -[soldier 2] Medical inspection!
Stay back there, ma'am. Just stay back there.
translation.zh: 站在后面别动 兄弟 待在后面就好
还有一个 好 过来

translation.en: No. All need to go. Come on.
translation.zh: 不行 所有孩子都需要走 过来

translation.en: No, we don't need-- There's nothing wrong with him.
translation.zh: 不要 我们不需要…他没什么病

translation.en: Just a little medical check, sir. You just stay back there.
translation.zh: 就是个小医疗检查 先生 你待在后面就好

translation.en: [soldier 3] That's right. Go join the others.
translation.zh: 没错 去找别人一起吧
-别动 -快跑 蒂米 快跑！

translation.en: Give me my son, you fucking bitch!
translation.zh: 把我儿子还给我 你个该死的混蛋！

translation.en: [soldier 1] How did you let him throw his shoe?
At this altitude, we need only seven minutes.
translation.zh: 在这个海拔 我们只需要七分钟

translation.en: [officer] Seven minutes allotted for your speech, sir.
translation.zh: 给你七分钟的演讲时间 部长

translation.en: -[in Spanish] This is so disappointing. -[in Chinese] This is so disappointing.
translation.zh: -这太令人失望了 -这太令人失望了

translation.en: No, no, we don't need all that. I've only got seven minutes.
translation.zh: 我们不需要翻译 我只有七分钟
这个 看到这个了吗？

translation.en: In this locomotive we call home,
translation.zh: 在我们称之为家的列车里

translation.en: between our warm hearts and the bitter cold.
translation.zh: 和刺骨的寒冷之间只有一样东西

translation.en: Order is the barrier that holds back the frozen death.
translation.zh: 秩序是阻挡冰冻死亡的屏障

translation.en: We must all of us, on this train of life,
translation.zh: 我们所有人 在这趟生之列车上
都待在我们指定的位置

translation.en: We must each of us occupy
translation.zh: 我们每个人都必须待在

translation.en: Would you wear a shoe on your head?
translation.zh: 你们会把鞋穿在头上吗？

translation.en: Of course, you wouldn't wear a shoe on your head.
A shoe doesn't belong on your head.
translation.zh: 鞋不应该待在你们的头上

translation.en: A shoe belongs on your foot.
translation.zh: 鞋应该待在你们的脚上

translation.en: A hat belongs on your head.
translation.zh: 帽子才应该待在你们的头上

translation.en: I am a hat. You are a shoe.
translation.zh: 我是帽子 你们是鞋

translation.en: In the beginning, order was prescribed by your ticket.
translation.zh: 最开始的时候 秩序是由你们的车票规定的

translation.en: First class, economy, and freeloaders like you.
translation.zh: 头等车厢、经济车厢 还有像你们这种吃白食的人

translation.en: Eternal order is prescribed by the Sacred Engine.
translation.zh: 永恒的秩序是由神圣的引擎规定的

translation.en: All things flow from the Sacred Engine.
translation.zh: 所有的一切都来自神圣的引擎
所有乘客待在自己的车厢

translation.en: all heat rising, pays homage to the Sacred Engine,
translation.zh: 所有上升的温度 都在自己注定的特定位置

translation.en: in its own particular preordained position.
When the foot seeks the place of the head,

translation.zh: 神圣的界限就被跨越了

translation.en: Well, we have, uh, 42 seconds left.
So, we could go to a comment from Mr. Wilford,
translation.zh: 我们可以听听威尔福德先生的评论

translation.en: the Divine Keeper of the Sacred Engine.
translation.zh: 他是神圣引擎的至高守护者

translation.en: Mr. Wilford's a very busy man.
translation.zh: 威尔福德先生是个大忙人

translation.en: -Not now. -I'm not just gonna fucking sit here.
translation.zh: -现在不行 -我可不要就他妈这样坐在这里

translation.en: [speaker] Put that useless gun down. Put it away!
translation.zh: 把那没用的枪放下 拿开！

translation.en: Long time no see, Mr. Gilliam.
translation.zh: 好久不见 吉列姆先生

translation.en: Minister Mason, please deliver a message to Mr. Wilford.
translation.zh: 梅森部长 请给威尔福德先生 带个口信

translation.en: -[Mason] Certainly, what shall I say? -Tell him he and I need to talk.
translation.zh: 当然可以 口信内容是？ 告诉他 我需要和他谈谈

translation.en: Well, you can talk to me.
Mr. Wilford has no reason to visit here.
translation.zh: 威尔福德先生没有理由来这里

translation.en: Your son will be a hero, I promise.
translation.zh: 你儿子会是个英雄的 我保证

translation.en: Right, I got it. I got it.
Your contribution has been duly noted. Thanks.
translation.zh: 你们的贡献已得到了充分重视 多谢

translation.en: Sumimasen. So sorry to interrupt while you're praying.

translation.zh: 你在做什么？抱歉 不好意思

translation.en: -[speaking Japanese] -Look. There's your Buddha back. Thanks.
translation.zh: 看 你的佛像又回来了 多谢
效果更强、更新鲜 还没有切过

translation.en: How many protein blocks for ten rocks of uncut Kronole?
translation.zh: 十颗未切的克罗诺 需要多少蛋白质块来换？

translation.en: [Curtis] Remember what Mason said? She said, "Put down that useless gun."
translation.zh: 还记得梅森说的话吗？ 她说：“把那没用的枪放下”

translation.en: She meant… she wouldn't give the order to shoot me.
translation.zh: 她的意思是她不会下令杀我

translation.en: No, I think the guns are literally useless.
translation.zh: 我觉得这些枪就是字面上的没用

translation.en: They used up all their bullets four years ago in the last revolt.
translation.zh: 他们在上次起义中用光了所有的子弹

translation.en: we could be finished before we even start.
translation.zh: 我们可能会在开始之前就结束

translation.en: I think we should be patient.
translation.zh: 我认为我们应该有耐心

translation.en: Wait for the next red letter.
No, not yet. Up! Now left.
translation.zh: 不行 还不行 向上！现在向左

translation.en: When you dream too much of the sun, you forget the trees.
translation.zh: 当你梦见太多的阳光 就会忘记树木

translation.en: I believe this is your son.
I'm sorry, it's… not very good. It's not my best work.
translation.zh: 抱歉 画得不是很好 这不是我最好的作品

translation.en: It's a little dark. But if you look very deep into the eyes,
translation.zh: 有点儿暗 但… 如果你深深地向眼睛里看去

translation.en: you can see a little bit of hope.
What about my boy? You got one of Timmy?
translation.zh: 那我儿子呢？你的画里有蒂米的吗？
有 塔尼娅 我画了

translation.en: Easy, easy. Come up this easy.
translation.zh: 慢点儿 慢点儿下来
这里 给你 蒂米

translation.en: Curtis, you gotta let me come with you.
translation.zh: 柯蒂斯 你必须让我跟你一起去
不行 塔尼娅 我很抱歉

translation.en: You will be if you don't let me come.
translation.zh: 如果你不让我一起去 你会后悔的

translation.en: I'm going to the front and make that bitch sorry she put her hands on my boy.
translation.zh: 我会让那婊子后悔对我儿子动手的

translation.en: You know I'm stronger than all these skinny-ass soldiers anyway.
translation.zh: 你知道我比这些瘦弱的士兵强壮多了

translation.en: They changed the schedule! Move it back!
translation.zh: 他们改变了日程 移到后面去

translation.en: Now or never! Coming now! Coming now!
[Curtis] Don't panic! Stick to the plan!
translation.zh: 不要慌张！ 按计划行事！

translation.en: Hide that! Hide your weapons in your clothes!
translation.zh: 藏起来！把你的武器藏在衣服里

translation.en: I've had enough of this protein block bullshit!
translation.zh: 受够蛋白质块的屁话了！
我们太他妈的饿了！ 我们要吃鸡肉！

translation.en: We're not gonna sit down for…
[soldier 1] You want him fucking dead. Is that it? Keep quiet!
translation.zh: 你们想让他死吗？保持安静！

translation.en: [soldier 2] Don't have to move. It's okay.
translation.zh: 不用必须移动 没事

translation.en: Still going for it, are we?
translation.zh: 我们还是按原计划进行吧？
没事 我们可以压倒他们
我们的数量远远超过他们子弹的数量

translation.en: We're outta time, man. You gotta do it now.
translation.zh: 我们没时间了 兄弟 你现在就要行动了

translation.en: They've got no bullets! They've got no bullets!
[Edgar] Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
[soldier 1] Close the gate quick! Shut it!
I'm fine, Grey. You go, now!
translation.zh: 我没事 格雷 你现在快去！
南宫民秀 痴迷于克罗诺 这就解释了很多 不是吗？

translation.en: That explains a lot, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 南宫民秀 痴迷于克罗诺 这就解释了很多 不是吗？ 快点儿 埃德加
快点儿 埃德加 快点儿？

translation.en: So sorry for keeping you all waiting.
'Cause obviously I work here or something.
So, this is Kronole. Hear it's pretty big in the front section.
translation.zh: 这个就是克罗诺 听说这东西 在前端车厢块很重要

translation.en: Careful. That's how these guys hallucinate.
translation.zh: 小心 那些人就是这样致幻的

translation.en: Are you Namgoong Minsoo? Security specialist?
translation.zh: 你是南宫民秀吗？安保专家？

translation.en: Did you design all the door locks and security systems on the train?
translation.zh: 列车上的门锁和安保系统 都是你设计的吗？

translation.en: [Edgar] Look at him, man. He's gone. Look at his eyes.
translation.zh: 看 他已经涣散了 看看他的眼睛

translation.en: He fried his brain with that fucking shite.
translation.zh: 他的大脑被那该死的东西烧坏了

translation.en: [in Korean] My name is Namgoong. Namgoong Minsoo.
translation.zh: 我的姓是南宫 南宫民秀

translation.en: Namgoong's my name. My surname is Minsoo, asshole.
translation.zh: 南宫是我的姓 民秀是我的名 混蛋

translation.en: Please try again with correct vocabulary.
translation.zh: 请用正确的词汇再说一次

translation.en: and we need you to open up the gates.
translation.zh: 我们需要你打开所有大门

translation.en: [in Korean] And if I don't want to?

translation.zh: 未切的、新鲜出炉的克罗诺

translation.en: you get one lump of Kronole.
Cigarettes have been extinct for more than ten years now.
translation.zh: 香烟已经绝迹十多年了

translation.en: [in Korean] You want a smoke too, asshole?
translation.zh: 你也想来一支吗 混蛋？

translation.en: I wouldn't waste it on a prick like you.
translation.zh: 我不会把烟浪费在你这种混蛋身上

translation.en: I'm gonna make this real simple for you. You help us. You get your drug.
translation.zh: 我直接了当地跟你说吧 你帮助我们 就可以拿到毒品

translation.en: If not, we put you back where we found you.
translation.zh: 如果你不帮 那我们就把你放回 找到你的地方

translation.en: Chan, get outta here. Skedaddle. Hey!
translation.zh: 小灿 离开这里 快走 喂！

translation.en: Put him back in the fucking drawer!
translation.zh: 快他妈把他放回抽屉里！

translation.en: [robot] If I go, she goes too.
translation.zh: 如果我去 她也要去

translation.en: [robot] One gate, two lumps of Kronole.
translation.zh: 一扇大门 两块克罗诺

translation.en: -[Edgar] Looks like they left in a hurry. -[Tanya] Hmm.
translation.zh: 看起来他们走得很匆忙

translation.en: This can't be a window, can it?
All right. Let's go, everyone. Stay focused.
translation.zh: 好吧 各位我们走吧 保持警惕

translation.en: -We didn't come here for this. -[Edgar] You heard the man. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们不是为这个来的 你听到他说的了 我们走

translation.en: How'd you know there was nobody there?
It used to be automatic, but parts went extinct.
translation.zh: 这之前是自动的 但零件用光了
-这不是我记忆中的保罗 -绝对不是

translation.en: -[Paul] So long, goodbye. Finito. -Paul! It's Curtis.
translation.zh: -再会 再见 结束 -保罗！我是柯蒂斯

translation.en: They ain't coming back. So, now I gotta do it… [grunts]
translation.zh: 他们不会回来了 所以现在我要…

translation.en: Man, you do some nice work.
That's right. There's your food. There's your protein blocks.
translation.zh: 没错 这就是你们的食物 这就是你们的蛋白质块

translation.en: [Curtis] Is this why they took you? To make this garbage?
translation.zh: 这就是他们带走你的原因吗？ 来制造这种垃圾？

translation.en: You been alone this whole time?
-We're going to the front. Come with us. -Alright.
translation.zh: 我们要去前端车厢 和我们一起去吧

translation.en: You going to the front? Yeah, man! But, no way, man.
translation.zh: 你们要去前端？当然要去 兄弟！ 但是不行 兄弟
我的位置就是这里 对吧？
这里？制造这种垃圾？为什么？

translation.en: All this time, we've been eating this shit? Hey! I eat 'em too, you know?
translation.zh: -我们一直在吃这种垃圾？ -喂！我也吃的 你知道吗？

translation.en: Have you been the one writing these?
Why do you have this? Who gave this to you?
translation.zh: 那你为什么有这个？谁给你的？

translation.en: They just leave them for me, man.
translation.zh: 他们就是给我了 兄弟

translation.en: I put them in the protein blocks.
translation.zh: 我把这些放进蛋白质块里

translation.en: I-- I send them on. That's it.
translation.zh: 我把这些发出去 仅此而已

translation.en: Yeah. It's just a few cars up.
translation.zh: 是的 就在前面几个车厢

translation.en: It's where the water's cleansed and recycled.
translation.zh: 水在那里被净化和循环利用

translation.en: It's one of the most crucial sections in the train.
translation.zh: 那是列车上最重要的车厢之一

translation.en: [Curtis] If we take it, we have the upper hand?
translation.zh: 如果我们掌管了那里 我们就占了上风？

translation.en: We don't even have to go to the very front.
translation.zh: 我们不用非要走到非常前端了

translation.en: Hi. Hi, excuse me. Sorry to bother you there.
translation.zh: 喂 不好意思 抱歉打扰你了

translation.en: Can I get you a glass of water or something to speed this up?
translation.zh: 要我给你倒杯水 或是做点儿什么 能让你快点吗？

translation.en: Would you get on with it, man? You're keeping us fucking waiting!
translation.zh: 你能抓紧吗？ 你他妈的让我们一直在等！

translation.en: Although you have been fucking smelling that flammable shite,
translation.zh: 你一直在闻那该死的可燃垃圾

translation.en: that time is probably a distant fucking concept for you, isn't it?
translation.zh: 所以时间对你来说可能是个模糊概念

translation.en: [in Korean] Of course, I do it for the Kronole.
translation.zh: 当然了 我是为克罗诺才做的

translation.en: Here we go again. Kronole this, Kronole that.
translation.zh: 又开始了 这个克罗诺 那个克罗诺

translation.en: Christ almighty, man, do some fucking work!
translation.zh: 我的天啊 快干点儿活吧！

translation.en: [in Korean] You keep giving it to me.
That's what you ask for each time you open a gate.
translation.zh: 这是你每打开一扇门时的要求
尤娜 你叫尤娜 对吧？

translation.en: Seventeen. You're a train baby then.
translation.zh: 17岁 那你就是在列车上出生的孩子

translation.en: Seventeen years in the tail section.
I don't wanna remember anything before I met Gilliam.
translation.zh: 我不想记得任何 在见到吉列姆之前的事了

translation.en: Well, you always seem to know what's behind the gates.
translation.zh: 你似乎总是知道大门后面有什么

translation.en: Do you see things in your mind?
translation.zh: 你能在脑海中看到未知事物吗？

translation.en: Shit. We're at the bridge, guys!
translation.zh: 靠 我们要到大桥了！

translation.en: Fucking hate getting older. I fucking hate it.
translation.zh: 真他妈讨厌变老 我太讨厌变老了

translation.en: -[man in Japanese] Wilford forever! -[soldiers in Japanese] Forever! Forever!
translation.zh: 威尔福德万岁！ 万岁！

translation.en: Hey, Nam, what are you doing, man? What are you doing?
translation.zh: 喂 南 你在做什么 兄弟？

translation.en: He's high as a fucking kite.
translation.zh: 他真是他妈的嗑药嗑嗨了

translation.en: Happy Yekaterina Bridge, you filthy ingrates!
translation.zh: 叶卡特林娜大桥快乐 你们这些忘恩负义的东西！

translation.en: You people, who if not for the benevolent Wilford,
translation.zh: 你们这些人 要不是威尔福德仁慈

translation.en: would have frozen solid 18 years ago today.
translation.zh: 你们早就在18年前的今天冻结实了

translation.en: who have suckled the generous titty of Wilford ever since
translation.zh: 从那时开始 一直仰仗威尔福德的哺育

translation.en: in front of our hallowed water supply section, no less,
translation.zh: 在我们神圣的供水车厢前
你们竟然以暴力流氓行为

translation.en: My friend, you suffer from the misplaced optimism of the doomed.
translation.zh: 我的朋友 你拥有对注定失败的人 错误的乐观

translation.en: This is going to be good.

translation.zh: 你们这些愚蠢的尾部乞丐

translation.en: There's a tunnel right after Yekaterina Bridge.
translation.zh: 叶卡特林娜大桥之后有一个隧道

translation.en: -A fucking long one. -[Nam in Korean] What are you doing? Run.
translation.zh: 特别长的一个隧道 还看什么？跑啊

translation.en: Tell them in the back we need to get the fire up here!
translation.zh: 告诉后面的人 我们要在这里点燃火焰！

translation.en: -Tell them in the back now! -[match flicks]
Officer Fuyu! What are you doing?
Don't look at me, you dozy bugger. Look there!
translation.zh: 别看我 你个蠢货 看那里！

translation.en: Help me down and stop squeezing my legs.
translation.zh: 扶我下来 别挤我的腿了

translation.en: He'll kill me if we don't surrender!
translation.zh: 如果我们不投降 他就要杀了我！

translation.en: Do what he says, for crying out loud!
[Tanya] Have you seen these kids, hmm?
I-- I don't know anything about--
Look, where are they, you bitch?
translation.zh: 听着 他们在哪儿 婊子？

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
Tell us, or I'll cut your fucking arm off even shorter than mine, you bastard.
translation.zh: 告诉我们 否则我会把你的手 砍得比我的还短

translation.en: That's why he sends that-- that yellow one, Claude, to get them for him.
translation.zh: 所以他才派那个穿黄衣服的人 克劳德 去抓孩子们

translation.en: It-- it's Wilford you want, not me!
translation.zh: 你想找的是威尔福德 不是我！

translation.en: All he cares about is his wretched engine.
translation.zh: 他只关心他那个破烂引擎
威尔福德是至高无上的

translation.en: See if he'll come save you.
We're gonna rip you into little pieces. He still won't come?
translation.zh: 我们会把你撕成碎片 他还是不会来吗？

translation.en: But we control the water. If we turn that off, he'll have to come.
translation.zh: 我们掌控着水 把水关掉 他就会来了

translation.en: Well, you'll only be condemning your own people.
translation.zh: 这样你只会让你自己的人死

translation.en: The water comes from the front.
The nose of the train breaks up the snow and ice
and… and turns it into water.
The water comes in the mouth,

translation.zh: 而不是屁股 柯蒂斯

translation.en: Yes. Wilford knows you well, Mr. Curtis Everett.
translation.zh: 没错 威尔福德对你很熟悉 柯蒂斯·埃弗雷特

translation.en: And we know you won't harm your own people.
translation.zh: 我们知道你不会伤害自己人

translation.en: Too bad you couldn't save your second-in-command.
translation.zh: 可惜你没能救回你的副手

translation.en: -What was his name? Edgar? -Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: -他叫什么名字？埃德加？ -快他妈的闭嘴！

translation.en: Curtis! Curtis! I can help you!
You can fucking die is what you can do.
translation.zh: 你能做的就是他妈的去死

translation.en: No, I can help you! I swear it!
translation.zh: 不是的 我可以帮助你！我发誓！

translation.en: You've got to go to him.
I know the train. I can guarantee you safe passage.
translation.zh: 我了解这趟列车 我可以保证你安全通过

translation.en: Why the fuck would I trust you?
translation.zh: 我他妈为什么要相信你？

translation.en: So you'd sell out Wilford the Benevolent?
translation.zh: 所以你要出卖仁慈的威尔福德？

translation.en: If I take you to the front, you have to kill him.
translation.zh: 如果我带你去了前端车厢 你就必须杀了他

translation.en: You kill him, and let me live.
translation.zh: 你杀了他 让我活命

translation.en: Are you still determined to push ahead?
translation.zh: 你还是决心要按计划勇往直前吗？
我们连一半都没走到呢

translation.en: You already got further than anyone else.
translation.zh: 你已经比别人走得远多了

translation.en: Better than McGregor four years ago.
translation.zh: 比四年前的麦格雷戈还远

translation.en: Ten cars, twenty cars, it doesn't matter unless we make it to the engine.
translation.zh: 10节车厢、20节车厢我都不在乎 除非我们到达引擎所在的位置

translation.en: They'll just regroup and attack us again.
translation.zh: 他们会重新集结 再次攻击我们

translation.en: Gotta pull 'em out by the roots.
translation.zh: 我们要把他们斩草除根

translation.en: But so many have been killed.
I told them to wash themselves,
translation.zh: 我告诉他们让他们洗洗自己

translation.en: so that I can assess the damage.
translation.zh: 这样我才能评估伤亡情况

translation.en: I can move a lot faster.
You stay here with the wounded, guard the prisoners.
When we take the engine, I'll call for you to lead us.
translation.zh: 当我们掌控了引擎 我会叫你来领导我们

translation.en: You know very well that you're already our leader.
translation.zh: 你非常清楚 你已经是我们的领袖了

translation.en: You have to accept that now.
translation.zh: 你现在必须接受这一点

translation.en: How can I lead if I have two good arms?
translation.zh: 如果我有两条好胳膊 那要怎么领导别人？

translation.en: Can't do a lot with one, you know?
translation.zh: 只有一只胳膊做不了很多事 你知道吗？

translation.en: Especially when you hold a woman.
translation.zh: 尤其是当你抱女人的时候

translation.en: Much better to have two arms, wouldn't you agree?
translation.zh: 最好有两只胳膊 你难道不同意吗？

translation.en: When you get to the narrow bridge,
translation.zh: 当你到达那座狭窄的桥时
那里有一个上面写有“W”的大门

translation.en: [artist] Okay, let's all get in there. Squeeze in.
translation.zh: 好 我们都到那里去 挤一挤
你必须和柯蒂斯一起去
哎哟 还少了一个人

translation.en: Don't mind me. Back to work, everyone. Back to work.
translation.zh: 别管我 大家都回去工作

translation.en: -[man in Japanese] Minister, are you okay? -[in Japanese] I'm fine.
translation.zh: 部长 你还好吧？ 我没事

translation.en: -Please, don't eat it. Don't eat it. -No, no, no, they're very friendly.
translation.zh: 拜托 不要吃那个 没事 他们很友好的

translation.en: They won't bite. Well, they might bite a tomato but…
translation.zh: 他们不会咬人 他们可能会咬一口西红柿但…

translation.en: [in Korean] A train baby like you wouldn't know,
translation.zh: 像你这样的列车孩子不会知道的

translation.en: but I grew up walking on it.
This is what's under the snow. Earth!
translation.zh: 这就是埋在雪底下的东西 土壤！
它在动 就在那底下

translation.en: Do any of you feel like sushi?
Hell yeah! Line that shit up.
translation.zh: 当然想！把那东西排好拿来

translation.en: This is only served twice in a year.
Oh, enough is not the criterion.
You see, this aquarium is a closed ecological system,
translation.zh: 你看 这个水族馆 是一个封闭的生态系统

translation.en: and, um, the number of individual units
must be very closely, precisely controlled,
in order to maintain the proper sustainable balance.
translation.zh: 为了保持适当的可持续平衡

translation.en: You know what that's made of?
translation.zh: 知道这是用什么做成的吗？

translation.en: do you think we might dispense with the restraints
translation.zh: 你觉得我们在下一节车厢

translation.en: Uh, for… for the sake of the young.
I am pleased to present guests from the tail section.
translation.zh: 我很高兴向你们介绍 来自尾部车厢的客人

translation.en: [teacher] Yes! And what do we say to tail section guests, children?
translation.zh: 是的！我们应该对尾部车厢的客人 说什么 孩子们？
早上好 尾部车厢客人！

translation.en: -Please take a good look at the picture. -I saw them!
translation.zh: -好好看看这张照片 -我看见过他们

translation.en: Came through there, went through there.
translation.zh: 从这里穿过 又从那里走了

translation.en: No, but they looked like they wanted to.
translation.zh: 没有 但他们看起来很想哭
我听说所有的尾部乞丐

translation.en: were lazy dogs who sat all day in their own shit.
translation.zh: 都是整天坐在自己大便里的懒狗

translation.en: Minister Mason, we were just about to show a video.
translation.zh: 梅森部长 我们正要放一个视频

translation.en: [narrator] From a very young age, Mr. Wilford's love of locomotives was apparent.
translation.zh: 从很小的时候起 威尔福德先生 对列车的热爱就显而易见了

translation.en: When I grow up, I'm gonna live on a train, forever.
translation.zh: 等我长大了 我要生活在列车上 直到永远

translation.en: His early dreams were realized when he founded his transportation empire,
translation.zh: 他早期的梦想 在他建立交通帝国时得以实现

translation.en: But his greatest dream was to construct a luxury locomotive cruise line,
translation.zh: 但他最大的梦想是 建造一条豪华的列车巡游线路

translation.en: connecting railways of the entire world into one.
translation.zh: 把全世界的铁路都连接在一起

translation.en: [narrator] A circular railway that extends for 438,000 kilometers
translation.zh: 一条长达43.8万千米的环形铁路

translation.en: and completes one circle every year.
Impervious to the extreme cold of the Arctic and the scorching heat of the African desert,
translation.zh: 不受北极严寒和沙漠酷热气候的影响
威尔福德的奇迹列车是自给自足的

translation.en: and possesses the most sophisticated design
As hard as it is to believe,
people in the Old World made fun of Mr. Wilford.
translation.zh: 旧世界的人们都取笑威尔福德先生
人们批评他对这趟绝妙列车
设计过于繁琐、配备过于繁杂

translation.en: But Mr. Wilford knew something they did not.
translation.zh: 但威尔福德先生知道一些 他们不知道的事情

translation.en: Old World people were frigging morons
translation.zh: 旧世界的人都是该死的白痴
他们都是被冻成冰棒的人

translation.en: Mr. Wilford knew that CW-7 would freeze the world.
translation.zh: 威尔福德先生知道 CW-7会冻结整个世界

translation.en: So what did the prophetic Mr. Wilford invent
translation.zh: 那么预言家威尔福德先生发明了什么

translation.en: to protect the chosen from that calamity?
translation.zh: 来保护被选中的人免受灾难呢？

translation.en: Rumble, rumble, rattle, rattle, it will never die!
translation.zh: 轰隆轰隆、卡嗒卡嗒 引擎永不停歇

translation.en: ♪ What happens if the engine stops? ♪
translation.zh: 如果引擎停止了会怎样？

translation.en: ♪ But will it stop? Oh, will it stop? ♪
translation.zh: 但引擎是否会停止？是否会停止？
因为引擎是永恒的 没错！
因为引擎是永恒的 没错！
威尔福德！威尔福德！大声欢呼！
好了！到时间了 孩子们！

translation.en: Don't push. There's plenty of room.
Who can tell me what's coming up?
translation.zh: 谁能告诉我接下来要发生什么了？

translation.en: This tableau will surely be on the exam.
translation.zh: 这个场景肯定会出现在考试中

translation.en: Fifteen years ago, in the third year of the train,
translation.zh: 15年前 在有列车的第三年

translation.en: seven passengers tried to stop Wilford's miracle train
translation.zh: 七位乘客试图 让威尔福德的奇迹列车停止

translation.en: And what do we call this event, Magdalena?
translation.zh: 我们把这个事件叫做什么？

translation.en: Very good. Long before you were born.
translation.zh: 非常好 发生在你出生很久之前

translation.en: Of course, they failed to stop the train.
translation.zh: 他们当然没能让列车停下来

translation.en: Instead, they jumped out of the running train.
translation.zh: 与之相反 他们跳出了 正在行驶的列车

translation.en: There they are. That's how far they made it.
translation.zh: 他们就在那儿 这就是他们走了多远

translation.en: [in Korean] That's a woman in the front.
A cleaner from the front section.
translation.zh: 是前端车厢里的清洁工
你知道的 爱斯基摩人

translation.en: She knew all about the ice and snow.
translation.zh: 她知道关于冰和雪的一切

translation.en: She believed we could survive outside.
translation.zh: 她相信我们能在外面生存

translation.en: If we ever go outside the train?
translation.zh: 如果我们走到列车的外面？

translation.en: And who takes care of the sacred engine?
Children, it's the New Year eggs from Mr. Wilford!
translation.zh: 孩子们！ 是威尔福德先生送来的新年蛋！

translation.en: These eggs are boiled using water heated by the sacred engine itself.
translation.zh: 这些鸡蛋是用神圣的列车头 自身加热的水来煮的

translation.en: As a special treat, we have playing for us
translation.zh: 作为一种特殊的款待 我们请来了

translation.en: the world-renowned first-chair violinist of the Boston Symphony Orchestra,
translation.zh: 世界著名的波士顿交响乐团 首席小提琴家
杰拉尔德·麦金特先生为我们演奏！

translation.en: I thought the chicken was extinct.
Actually, many things on board were rumored to be extinct.
translation.zh: 列车上的很多东西都被谣传灭绝了

translation.en: It wasn't me! It wasn't me!
Curtis, my friend, we understand each other.
translation.zh: 柯蒂斯 我的朋友 我们都相互理解一下

translation.en: Listen to my words. It wasn't me!
translation.zh: 你听我说 真的不是我！

translation.en: Hey, hey! Firearm regulations! To minimize dam--
[soldier 1] God, that does not look good.
translation.zh: 天啊 看起来情况不妙

translation.en: [soldier 2] Hurry, hurry. You got the master key, right?
translation.zh: 快点儿！你有万能钥匙 对吧？

translation.en: Wait! Don't shoot. Please don't shoot!
You just killed a front-section passenger! I'm--
translation.zh: 你刚杀了一名前端乘客！我…

translation.en: Can we talk about this for one second?
[man 1] Stop, man! I want my Kronole!
translation.zh: 住手！我想要我的克罗诺！

translation.en: [man 2] Hey, turn around, motherfucker. You got my Kronole!
translation.zh: 转过去 混蛋 你拿了我的克罗诺！

translation.en: [man 1] Don't make me come after you. I want that shit!
translation.zh: 别逼我追你 我想要我的东西！

translation.en: [man 1] I'm coming after you. I want my Kronole back!
translation.zh: 我要追你了 我要拿回我的克罗诺

translation.en: -[man 2] That's my Kronole! -What the fuck do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: -那是我的克罗诺！ -你他妈觉得自己在干什么？

translation.en: I swear, man, I'm gonna kill you, you spaced-out fuck!
translation.zh: 我发誓 兄弟 我要杀了你 你个意识混乱的混蛋！
先拿来克罗诺 克罗诺
克罗诺？要更多的克罗诺？给 拿着

translation.en: [in Korean] What the hell's wrong with you? You and your fucking gates.
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么了？ 你和你那该死的大门
你应该心存感激 这是人类最后一支烟了 你个尾车的猪头

translation.en: [robot] The world's last cigarette, you tail-section pig.
translation.zh: 世界上最后一根烟 你这个尾部车厢的猪

translation.en: You ever been to the tail section?
[Curtis] Any idea what went on back there?
translation.zh: 知道那里发生了什么吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we didn't freeze to death, but we didn't have time to be thankful.
translation.zh: 我们没有冻死 但我们没时间心存感激

translation.en: Wilford's soldiers came, and they took everything.
translation.zh: 威尔福德的士兵来了 抢走了一切

translation.en: A thousand people in an iron box.
translation.zh: 一千人在一个铁盒子里

translation.en: After a month, we ate the weak.
translation.zh: 一个月后我们吃了虚弱的人

translation.en: You know what I hate about myself?
translation.zh: 你知道我恨自己什么吗？

translation.en: I know what people taste like.
translation.zh: 我知道人尝起来的味道

translation.en: I know that babies taste best.
translation.zh: 我知道婴儿尝起来味道最好

translation.en: She was hiding with her baby.
translation.zh: 她和她的孩子藏在一起

translation.en: And some men with knives came.
They killed her, and they took her baby.
translation.zh: 他们杀了她并抢走了她的孩子
非亲非故的 就是一个老头

translation.en: And everyone thought he'd kill the baby himself.
translation.zh: 大家都觉得他会亲手杀了孩子

translation.en: and he cut off his arm.
translation.zh: 把自己的胳膊切了下来

translation.en: And he said, "Eat this if you're so hungry."
translation.zh: 他说：“如果你们实在太饿 就吃这个吧

translation.en: "Eat… eat this. Just leave the baby."
translation.zh: 吃这个 把婴儿留下来”

translation.en: I had never seen anything like that.
And the men put down their knives.
Probably guessed who that old man was.
translation.zh: 你大概猜到那老头是谁了

translation.en: And I was the man with the knife.
And then, one by one, other people in the tail section
translation.zh: 然后一个接一个地 尾部车厢的其他人

translation.en: started cutting off arms and legs
A month later, Wilford's soldiers brought those protein blocks.
translation.zh: 一个月后 威尔福德的士兵 带来了那些蛋白质块

translation.en: We've been eating that shit ever since.
translation.zh: 从那以后我们就一直吃那东西

translation.en: Eighteen years, I've waited for this moment.
[in Korean] Thanks for your story, Curtis.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的故事 柯蒂斯

translation.en: But I don't want to open that gate.
translation.zh: 但我不想打开那扇大门

translation.en: You know what I really want?
translation.zh: 你知道我真正想要什么吗？

translation.en: I want to open a gate.
The gate to the outside world.
It's been frozen shut for 18 years.
You might take it for a wall.
translation.zh: 你可能把它当成一堵墙
但这他妈的是一扇大门

translation.en: Let's open it and just get the hell out.
translation.zh: 我们打开它 然后逃离这里吧
你到底是什么 你是疯子吗？

translation.en: What if we could survive outside?
translation.zh: 如果我们能在外面活下去呢？
还记得叶卡特林娜大桥吗？

translation.en: When you guys were getting chopped up?
translation.zh: 就是你们被砍碎的那里？

translation.en: There's something I look at every New Year.
translation.zh: 我每年新年都会在那里看一样东西

translation.en: A crashed airplane buried under the snow.
translation.zh: 一架被埋在雪下的坠毁飞机

translation.en: All I could see ten years ago was the tail.
translation.zh: 十年前我能看到的只有机尾

translation.en: Now the body and wings are peeking out.
translation.zh: 但现在机体和机翼都漏出来了

translation.en: This snow is about to melt.
No need to tell you this.
You gotta take it easy on that Kronole.
translation.zh: 你可要控制着点儿吸食克罗诺

translation.en: Snorting that flammable shit is gonna fry your brain.
translation.zh: 吸那易燃的东西会损伤你的大脑
把克罗诺点燃 然后炸开！
这是个炸弹 你个傻子

translation.en: I didn't collect this shit for years just to get high.
translation.zh: 我这么多年来收集这些东西 可不是为了嗑药

translation.en: It's to blow up this gate.
What the fuck are you doing?
I've been asked to extend a formal invitation from Mr. Wilford
translation.zh: 威尔福德先生让我正式邀请你
柯蒂斯 亲爱的孩子 进来

translation.en: Let's take a look at you.
You did a man's work coming all this way.
translation.zh: 你一路闯过来历经千辛

translation.en: You are the first human being to have walked the total length of this train.
translation.zh: 你是第一个走完整趟列车的人
干得漂亮 真是厉害

translation.en: None of your people have ever been here.
translation.zh: 你的人从没有来过这里

translation.en: I've never been to the tail section.
Why not? Too dirty for you?
translation.zh: 为什么呢？ 对你来说太脏了吗？

translation.en: Don't wanna rub against the vermin of the tail section?
Do you think my station is without its own drawbacks?
translation.zh: 你觉得我这个地方没有任何缺点吗？

translation.en: Plenty of room. This whore to bring you anything you want.
translation.zh: 大量的空间 这个婊子能给你 任何你想要的东西

translation.en: Curtis, everyone has their preordained position,
translation.zh: 柯蒂斯 每个人都有自己注定的位置

translation.en: and everyone is in their place except you.
translation.zh: 大家都待在自己的位置上 除了你

translation.en: That's what people in the best place say to people in the worst place.
translation.zh: 这是在好地方待的人 说给在坏地方待的人的话

translation.en: There's not a soul on this train who wouldn't trade places with you.
translation.zh: 这里没有一个人会不愿意 和你交换位置

translation.en: Would you trade places with me?
translation.zh: 你愿意和我交换位置吗？
柯蒂斯 亲爱的孩子

translation.en: The fact is, we're all stuck inside this blasted train.
translation.zh: 事实是我们都被困在这该死的列车里

translation.en: We are all prisoners in this hunk of metal.
translation.zh: 我们都是这铁块里的囚徒

translation.en: And this train is a closed ecosystem.
translation.zh: 这趟列车是一个封闭的生态系统

translation.en: We must always strive for balance.
translation.zh: 我们必须始终保持平衡

translation.en: The population must always be kept in balance.
translation.zh: 人口数量必须一直保持平衡

translation.en: For optimum balance, however, there were times
when more radical solutions were required
translation.zh: 当人口需要大幅减少时

translation.en: when the population needed to be reduced rather…
We don't have time for true natural selection.
translation.zh: 我们没有时间进行真正的自然选择

translation.en: We would all be hideously overcrowded and starve waiting for that.
translation.zh: 因为那样我们会人满为患、忍饥挨饿

translation.en: is to have individual units kill off other individual units.
translation.zh: 就是让单个车厢消灭其他车厢

translation.en: From time to time, we've had to stir the pot, so to speak.
translation.zh: 打个比方 我们必须时不时地搅一搅

translation.en: A blockbuster production with a devilishly unpredictable plot.
translation.zh: 一部情节极其不可预测的大片

translation.en: Who could've predicted your counterattack with the torch in Yekaterina Tunnel?
translation.zh: 谁料到你会在 叶卡特林娜隧道发起反击？

translation.en: That wasn't what Gilliam and I had in our plan.
translation.zh: 那不是我和吉列姆的计划

translation.en: Now don't tell me you didn't know.
The front and the tail are supposed to work together.
translation.zh: 前端和尾部车厢本打算一起合作的

translation.en: He was, uh, more than a partner, really.
translation.zh: 他不只是我的合伙人 真的

translation.en: [scoffs] Our original agreement was for the insurgency to end

translation.zh: 在叶卡特林娜隧道结束叛乱

translation.en: And all the survivors would go back to the tail section
translation.zh: 幸存者会回到尾部车厢

translation.en: You're a fucking liar. Gilliam would never do that.
translation.zh: 你他妈是个骗子 吉列姆绝不会那么做的

translation.en: Uh, it all worked out in the end.
Your counterattack actually made the insurgency ten times more exciting.
translation.zh: 你的反击实际上 让暴动变得更刺激了十倍

translation.en: Unfortunately, the front suffered more losses than anticipated
translation.zh: 不幸的是 前端遭受了 比预期更多的损失

translation.en: and, uh… Gilliam had to… [clicks tongue] …pay the price.
How people dramatically cross that thin barrier between life and death?
translation.zh: 人们是如何戏剧性地 跨越生与死之间那道 薄薄屏障的？

translation.en: Now there's just one last thing for us to do.
translation.zh: 现在我们还有最后一件事要做
喂 威尔福德 是我

translation.en: Is it still the same number?

translation.zh: 抽18个人活命 来庆祝我们的第18个年头

translation.en: It's, uh… an excellent idea. Yes.
translation.zh: 这真是个好主意 遵命

translation.en: God damn it, Claude, mind the engine!
translation.zh: 该死 克劳德 小心引擎！
引擎最近变得越来越敏感了

translation.en: Sit down and mind your table manners.
translation.zh: 坐下 注意你的餐桌礼仪

translation.en: Boy, now I see what Gilliam meant. He told me you were brilliant and clever
translation.zh: 现在我明白吉列姆的意思了 他跟我说你很聪明 但总是绷得很紧
他跟我说你很聪明 但总是绷得很紧

translation.en: When's the last time you got laid, hmm?
translation.zh: 你上次做爱是什么时候？

translation.en: Like Gilliam said, holding a woman is much better with two arms.
translation.zh: 就像吉列姆说的 双手抱女人更好

translation.en: I'll miss our late-night phone chats. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我会怀念我们深夜的电话聊天

translation.en: He could go on for hours.
translation.zh: 他可以讲上好几个小时

translation.en: You look like a crazy person.
As if there aren't enough crazies on this train.
translation.zh: 好像这列车上的疯子还不够多似的

translation.en: [in Korean] Yona. We need to open the gate and get the Kronole!
translation.zh: 尤娜 我们需要打开那扇大门

translation.en: I believe it is easier for someone to survive on this train
translation.zh: 我相信如果一个人 有某种程度的精神错乱

translation.en: if they have some level of insanity.
translation.zh: 那他在这列火车上更容易活下来

translation.en: I mean, as Gilliam well understood,
translation.zh: 我是说 正如吉列姆所理解的

translation.en: we need to maintain a proper balance of anxiety and fear,
translation.zh: 我们需要在焦虑和害怕

translation.en: chaos and horror, in order to keep life going.
translation.zh: 混乱和恐惧之间保持适当的平衡 这样生活才能继续

translation.en: And if we don't have that,
In that sense, The Great Curtis Revolution you invented
translation.zh: 从这个意义上说 你创造的柯蒂斯大革命

translation.en: [in Korean] Red goes into eight! No, seven!
translation.zh: 红色的连接八号！ 不对 七号！

translation.en: Something I want to show you.

translation.zh: 很温馨 对吧？很祥和

translation.en: You are now in her heart.
I've devoted my entire life to this.
translation.zh: 我把我的一生都献给了这个东西

translation.en: Have you ever been alone on this train?
translation.zh: 你在这趟列车上有独处过吗？

translation.en: When was the last time you were alone?
translation.zh: 你最后一次独处是什么时候？

translation.en: So, please do take your time.
I want you to take my station.
Section after section, precisely where they've always been
translation.zh: 一节接着一节车厢 一直在它们之前在的位置

translation.en: And now the perfectly correct number of human beings,
translation.zh: 现在完美合适的人口数量

translation.en: all in their proper places, all adding up to what?
translation.zh: 都待在他们应在的位置 这些加起来是什么？

translation.en: And now you have the sacred responsibility to lead all of humanity.
translation.zh: 现在你肩负着 领导全人类的神圣责任

translation.en: Without you, Curtis, humanity will cease to exist.
translation.zh: 柯蒂斯 没有你 人类将不复存在

translation.en: You've seen what people do without leadership.
translation.zh: 你见识过没有领导的人会做什么

translation.en: [in Korean] Put the Kronole on the gate!

translation.zh: 他们很可笑、很可悲 不是吗？

translation.en: You can save them from themselves.
translation.zh: 你可以从他们自己手里拯救他们

translation.en: This is what Gilliam saved you for.
translation.zh: 这正是吉列姆救你的目的

translation.en: -[in Korean] It's done! -Curtis has the match!
translation.zh: -弄好了！ -柯蒂斯拿着那根火柴！

translation.en: The space only allows for a very small person.
translation.zh: 这个空间只容得下一个小体型的人

translation.en: The engine lasts forever, but not so all of its parts.
translation.zh: 发动机可以永远使用 但并非所有部件都可以

translation.en: That piece of equipment went extinct recently.
Thank goodness the tail section manufactures a steady supply of kids.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 尾部车厢 能提供稳定的孩子数量

translation.en: So, we can keep going manually.
translation.zh: 因此我们就可以手动继续

translation.en: [robot via PA] Manual load reactor check in progress.
translation.zh: 正在进行人工负荷电抗器检查

translation.en: [robot via PA] Please stand at a safe distance.
[robot via PA] Manual load reactor check in progress.
translation.zh: 正在进行人工负荷电抗器检查

translation.en: Please stand at a safe distance.
Manual load reactor check in progress.
translation.zh: 正在进行人工负荷电抗器检查
安迪 别走！ 听我说

translation.en: Don't go up those stairs. Listen!
translation.zh: 别上那些楼梯 听着！

translation.en: Get out! God damn it, Andy, listen to me!
translation.zh: 出来！真该死 安迪 听我说！

translation.en: You know everyone has their own preordained position.
translation.zh: 你知道每个人都有自己注定的位置
